thread.title: Singer Kaveh and Songwriting Team George Domiano and Johnny Bower Release New Single "In Time"
thread.title_full: Singer Kaveh and Songwriting Team George Domiano and Johnny Bower Release New Single "In Time" - PR.com

author: PR.com
title: Singer Kaveh and Songwriting Team George Domiano and Johnny Bower Release New Single "In Time"
text:
Singer Kaveh and Songwriting Team George Domiano and Johnny Bower Release New Single "In Time"
Providence, RI, September 09, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Big Noise and songwriters George Domiano and Johnny Bower are proud to announce the release of the latest single from UK singer Kaveh, 'In Time.'
'In Time' is the title track from the EP which was placed by The Recording Academy on their Official Ballot for the 57th Annual Grammy Awards for Best Pop Vocal Performance and Best Pop Album.
According to Domiano, "One day you come to the realization that you can't let success be all-consuming and you will be ok. You will continue to write for the love you have for the songs, the music and the writing process, and sometimes knowing how good you are is enough. I really do want to share my music with the world and these songs deserve to be heard."
"Johnny and I have a very unique way of writing together. If you are familiar with the writing process of Elton John and writing partner Bernie Taupin, ours is the exact opposite. Bernie would give Elton lyrics then Elton would add the music. With us, Johnny sends me the music and I add the lyrics. We have been working together 18 years and it still works. The song 'Broken' came to me at a very hard time in my life. My wife and I were breaking up. The lyrics were written 20 minutes after I got the music from Johnny. This song has always been a fan favorite. Now with the new video ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8uuFllpW6DQ ) it is receiving a whole new audience and numerous views."
The EP 'In Time' is available now at iTunes:
https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/in-time-ep/id898111906
Kaveh, George Domiano and Johnny Bower Offical Website:
http://www.bignoisenow.com/kaveh.html
